configuration:
dfs.namenode.name.dir file:/home/hdfs/data/nameNode
dfs.datanode.data.dir file:/data1,file:/data2,file:/data3
dfs.hosts.exclude /etc/hadoop/conf/excludes
dfs.replication 1
dfs.nameservices mycluster
dfs.ha.namenodes.mycluster nn3,nn4
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.mycluster.nn3 mn3.gawande.local:8020
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.mycluster.nn4 mn4.gawande.local:8020
dfs.namenode.http-address.mycluster.nn3 mn3.gawande.local:50070
dfs.namenode.http-address.mycluster.nn4 mn4.gawande.local:50070
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir /data/mycluster
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://mn3.gawande.local:8485;mn4.gawande.local:8485;mn5.gawande.local:8485/mycluster
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.mycluster org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.private-key-files /home/hadoop/.ssh/id_rsa
dfs.ha.fencing.methods shell(/bin/true)
# # dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.connect-timeout # 30000 #
